title: Is there gonna be a way to edit champ select music?
body: Back in the days before the new champ select got introduced I used to replace the normal draft music with LCS titles, simply because it feels much more hyphy. Is there gonna be a way to do so with the new client? Would be amazing if you'd let us replace the soundfiles again :)

replies.body:
I've no idea, friend. I'm not a member of the team that works on the New Client, so I don't have that info. We'll both have to wait and see what the final version of the new client ends up looking like. ^.^

Let me know if you have any questions.
